features: ⭐【MULTIFUNCTION 3 DRAWERS DRESSER】The storage end table with drawer designed lightweight, features 3 removable foldable drawers. An idea furniture of room accessories, style meets function, an nice storage organizer unit for all your stuff. The bedside tables with drawer is great for bedrooms, living room, playrooms, closets, nurseries, entryways and more.

❤️【POWERFUL STORAGE SPACE】Yoobure bedside dresser with 3 fabric drawers are idea storage cabinet. Small nightstand drawers tower are great for organizing your clothes, blankets, toys, paperwork and other accessories. Wood top provides hard surface, can display lamps, clocks, books, glasses etc. The dresser is a hidden storage, say goodbye to clutter.

💪【STURDY & DURABLE】The fabric drawer dresser is made of steel frames , MDF wood board and non-woven farbic, enhancing its stability and durability. Wooden pull handles is easy to open and close the storage drawers. Adjustable plastic feet is fit for uneven surfaces and protect your floor from scratches. Eco-friendly material, odorless and safety.

🛠️【EASY ASSEMBLY】 Easy to assemble only use hardware attach with package, follow the instruction and you can assemble the small dressers for bedroom in 10-15 minutes.This nightstand Frame Dimension: 15.75" L x 11.81" W x 27.95" H, Drawer Dimension: 13.39" L x 11.02" W x 8.27" H. The bearing capacity up to 35 lbs for top and 6.6 lbs for each drawers.

✅【One Year Warranty】Please check whether the accessories in the package of dresser organizer are complete when you received the grey bedroom dresser for closet, if some are missing, please contact us first. We attach great importance to product quality and customer service, any problems, our friendly customer service team will always be here for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Durable Fabric Drawers The bedroom dresser offers ample storage space. Each drawer is made of durable non-woven & MDF board, providing strong support to store various items. X-Shape Sturdy Steel Frame Made with a strong steel frame and durable MDF wood top. Enhance stablility and durability, easy to assemble. Wooden Pull Handle Portable wooden handles make it easy to push and pull the drawer of dresser, ensuring smooth opening and closing even when fully loaded. Adjustable Feet Pad Screw-in adjustable feet fit for uneven surfaces and protect your floor from scratches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive Storage with Solid Top and Easy Assembly
reviews.reviewText: The manufacturer gives you everything you need to assemble this nightstand. It took me 15-20 minutes to do the job - read the instructions- it's pretty straight forward.The unit itself is exactly what the description said. We are using it for art supplies but you can't load the cloth compartments up and expect them to slide- they are cloth- use your common sense or buy non cloth furniture. I get tired of complaints on Amazon about items that are not being used as manufacturer explains or that don't serve the buyers purposes because they wanted the product to behave differently- those types of complaints distract from useful information gathering.This item has cloth drawers with semi rigid bottoms and they are solid enough to hold light plastic bins of art supplies or whatever lightweight items you want if you don't overload. The price was right for what it CAN DO. It was easy to put together and it serves our purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect solution to my space crisis
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been in the midst of rearranging and redecorating my space to make room for a large table I’m building for my pet tortoise. It wasn’t until I put together the table my enclosure will sit on that I realized just how much space I was needing and how much I was going to have to downsize. I wanted a wood bedside table with drawers. That’s 1. Harder to find than expected and 2. EXPENSIVE!!! I wanted closer drawers and a lot of the wood pieces I was finding were shelves where baskets could be placed. After looking at similar pieces to this product, I ultimately chose this brand due to reviews and appearance. It has a small, but decent size wooden top piece that’s big enough to hold a smaller lamp and several small items. The drawers are all the same size and have a nice depth to them. The boards that comprise the drawers are not flimsy as with other brands. The frame is strong and surprisingly sturdy even without items on top. I bought some non adhesive drawer liner from the dollar tree to line the drawers to protect them but also gives a nice look! You don’t always have to pay high end dollars to make a space look nice. This piece gave my space an elegant/modern look while solving my space crisis I was having!!! And the price was reasonable. All and all would recommended to others! See attached pictures

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got this for my son’s room. It’s easy to put together, has quality materials, and a great price. The drawers are fabric but still sturdy.

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I re-ordered the nightstand i have in the background. For his and hers nightstands
reviews.reviewText: Explain to me why i re-order the light grey nighstand. I double checked, and i get a white one? I made sure i didn’t select something by mistake. I love this nightstand, good quality and easy to put together. But, i’m not very pleased with the fact i ordered light-grey and get white? Has this happened to anyone else?
